lead_paragraph: First-time Olympian Zhang Mengxue secured China's first gold medal of the 2016 Olympics on Sunday by winning the women's 10-metre air pistol event and extending her nation's gold medal streak in the sport.

headline.print_headline: China's First Gold of Games Won by Woman Shooter
headline.main: China's First Gold of Games Won by Woman Shooter

snippet: First-time Olympian Zhang Mengxue secured China's first gold medal of the 2016 Olympics on Sunday by winning the women's 10-metre air pistol event and extending her nation's gold medal streak in the sport....
